content: You are Tommaso. Regarding your unsuccessfully completed an action 'pickup_for_storage' regarding 'source_stock_insufficient' involving Ludovico., Ludovico just said to you: '"Ah, Tommaso! Source stock ran dry, eh? Bit of a bother, isn’t it? We'll sort it out."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Right you are, Ludovico. A bit of a snag, certainly. Glad you're looking into it!"

You are Tommaso. Regarding your unsuccessfully completed an action 'pickup_for_storage' regarding 'source_stock_insufficient' involving Ludovico., Ludovico just said to you: '"Ah, Tommaso! Stock's a bit low, eh? Let's see what we can do about that. Don't worry about it."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Right you are, Ludovico. Thanks for the heads-up! I'll sort it out."
